Apartment.english: 1. The apartment has a spacious living room.
Apartment.italian: L'appartamento ha un ampio soggiorno.
Apartment.spanish: El apartamento tiene una sala de estar espaciosa.
Apartment.german: Die Wohnung hat ein geräumiges Wohnzimmer.

Apartment.english: 2. I love the view from my apartment window.
Apartment.italian: Amo la vista dalla finestra del mio appartamento.
Apartment.spanish: Me encanta la vista desde la ventana de mi apartamento.
Apartment.german: Ich liebe die Aussicht aus meinem Wohnungsfenster.

Apartment.english: 3. The rent for the apartment is quite expensive.
Apartment.italian: L'affitto dell'appartamento è piuttosto costoso.
Apartment.spanish: El alquiler del apartamento es bastante caro.
Apartment.german: Die Miete für die Wohnung ist ziemlich teuer.

Apartment.english: 4. The apartment is located in a quiet neighborhood.
Apartment.italian: L'appartamento si trova in un quartiere tranquillo.
Apartment.spanish: El apartamento está ubicado en un barrio tranquilo.
Apartment.german: Die Wohnung befindet sich in einer ruhigen Nachbarschaft.

Apartment.english: 5. The apartment has a modern kitchen.
Apartment.italian: L'appartamento ha una cucina moderna.
Apartment.spanish: El apartamento tiene una cocina moderna.
Apartment.german: Die Wohnung hat eine moderne Küche.

Apartment.english: 6. The apartment has two bedrooms and a bathroom.
Apartment.italian: L'appartamento ha due camere da letto e un bagno.
Apartment.spanish: El apartamento tiene dos habitaciones y un baño.
Apartment.german: Die Wohnung hat zwei Schlafzimmer und ein Badezimmer.

Apartment.english: 7. The apartment is on the third floor.
Apartment.italian: L'appartamento si trova al terzo piano.
Apartment.spanish: El apartamento está en el tercer piso.
Apartment.german: Die Wohnung befindet sich im dritten Stock.

Apartment.english: 8. The apartment complex has a swimming pool.
Apartment.italian: Il complesso di appartamenti ha una piscina.
Apartment.spanish: El complejo de apartamentos tiene una piscina.
Apartment.german: Die Wohnanlage hat einen Swimmingpool.

Apartment.english: 9. The apartment comes fully furnished.
Apartment.italian: L'appartamento viene fornito completamente arredato.
Apartment.spanish: El apartamento se entrega completamente amueblado.
Apartment.german: Die Wohnung wird voll möbliert geliefert.

Apartment.english: 10. The apartment is pet-friendly.
Apartment.italian: L'appartamento accetta animali domestici.
Apartment.spanish: El apartamento admite mascotas.
Apartment.german: Die Wohnung ist haustierfreundlich.

Apartment.english: 11. The apartment has a balcony overlooking the city.
Apartment.italian: L'appartamento ha un balcone con vista sulla città.
Apartment.spanish: El apartamento tiene un balcón con vistas a la ciudad.
Apartment.german: Die Wohnung hat einen Balkon mit Blick auf die Stadt.

Apartment.english: 12. The apartment has central heating and air conditioning.
Apartment.italian: L'appartamento dispone di riscaldamento centralizzato e aria condizionata.
Apartment.spanish: El apartamento cuenta con calefacción central y aire acondicionado.
Apartment.german: Die Wohnung verfügt über Zentralheizung und Klimaanlage.

Apartment.english: 13. The apartment is within walking distance of the train station.
Apartment.italian: L'appartamento si trova a pochi passi dalla stazione ferroviaria.
Apartment.spanish: El apartamento está a poca distancia de la estación de tren.
Apartment.german: Die Wohnung ist nur wenige Gehminuten vom Bahnhof entfernt.

Apartment.english: 14. The apartment has a secure parking garage.
Apartment.italian: L'appartamento dispone di un parcheggio coperto sicuro.
Apartment.spanish: El apartamento cuenta con un garaje de estacionamiento seguro.
Apartment.german: Die Wohnung hat eine sichere Tiefgarage.

Apartment.english: 15. The apartment is available for immediate move-in.
Apartment.italian: L'appartamento è disponibile per il trasferimento immediato.
Apartment.spanish: El apartamento está disponible para mudarse de inmediato.
Apartment.german: Die Wohnung ist sofort bezugsfertig.

Apartment.english: 16. The apartment has a washer and dryer in the unit.
Apartment.italian: L'appartamento dispone di lavatrice e asciugatrice nell'unità.
Apartment.spanish: El apartamento tiene lavadora y secadora en la unidad.
Apartment.german: Die Wohnung hat eine Waschmaschine und einen Trockner in der Einheit.

Apartment.english: 17. The apartment is located near a shopping center.
Apartment.italian: L'appartamento si trova vicino a un centro commerciale.
Apartment.spanish: El apartamento está cerca de un centro comercial.
Apartment.german: Die Wohnung befindet sich in der Nähe eines Einkaufszentrums.

Apartment.english: 18. The apartment has hardwood floors throughout.
Apartment.italian: L'appartamento ha pavimenti in legno in tutto.
Apartment.spanish: El apartamento tiene pisos de madera en todo el lugar.
Apartment.german: Die Wohnung hat durchgehend Parkettböden.

Apartment.english: 19. The apartment has a private patio.
Apartment.italian: L'appartamento ha un patio privato.
Apartment.spanish: El apartamento tiene un patio privado.
Apartment.german: Die Wohnung hat eine private Terrasse.

Apartment.english: 20. The apartment is well-maintained and in excellent condition.
Apartment.italian: L'appartamento è ben tenuto ed in ottime condizioni.
Apartment.spanish: El apartamento está bien mantenido y en excelentes condiciones.
Apartment.german: Die Wohnung ist gut gepflegt und in ausgezeichnetem Zustand.
